column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Can I please say how the calamari appetizer is literally one of the best calamari I have ever had? When it was served on the table
column2: I was not expecting much already because it looked too crispy and fried. But wow
column3: the combination of the calamari with the house dipping sauce is AMAZING. The dipping sauce is not your typical tomato sauce. It's refreshing and it reminded me a little bit of a mignonette sauce used for raw oysters.
